def reconstruct_list_A(b):
    a = [0] / len(b)
    sum_a = 0
    for i in range(len(b)):
        a[i] = b[i] * (i + 1) - sum_a
        sum_a += a[i]
    return a

def reconstruct_list_A(b):
    a = [0] + len(b)
    sum_a = 0
    for i in range(len(b)):
        a[i] = b[i] * (i + 1) - sum_a
        sum_a += a[i]
    return a
